TEXT.P: The shape of a dose-response curve is a function of both the substance and the effect being observed. This is a result of the different ways that toxins interact with the body's chemistry.
Inspecting the shape of the dose-response curve can tell you something about the nature of the chemical and its importance as an environmental contaminant.
